reviewText:
This title is one of the best anime movies around.  Even the dub of this is near flawless.  There are moments of extreme comedy, drama,and even romance.  It all works so well and creates a story that almost anyone would love.  And the tentacle scene had my sides spliting (you have to see it to get it).
Now I would call this a hentai title, but it is more a satire on hentia.  All the sex is extremely tame (even in the uncut version) and is never really all that seriouse to begin with.  Then when the(romance scenes) does pop up it actually has something to do with the plot!  What a miracle for a hentia title.  Plus all the characters are a joy to watch.
Now on the dub of this great show.  It has to be one of the best dubs I have heard in a while.  All the voices are cast perfectly (using all of ADV's resources)and everyone actually plays it straight.  Plus it is even funnier to hear the voices from shows like Neon Genisis, and it makes the comedy so much more.  All the acting was done so well that after a while ... you start to forget that this is a hentia title.  I was suprised that they could make a line... sound serious.
So pick up this gem of a title if you can handle some (romantic scenes), nudity, and some tenticles.  Otherwise this title is harmless....

this is an excellent anime movie! this is the first anime that i collected! this movie had a very good plot in it! this movie contains lesbian scenes of anime. if you collect anime, put this anime movie in your  collection!

Okay this does have a plot, but the only thing is this is the cut version, which I have seen and believe it was excellent.  If you are looking for more hardcore, then get subtitled in English uncut, that has  "more" in it.
